title: Machine Learning
text:
Machine learning (ML) is a branch of artificial intelligence that enables systems to learn from data and improve performance without being explicitly programmed.
A standardized work flow leads to better outcomes. I divide my work flow into three phases:

Plan, collect and clean
Explore, model and validate
Communicate, reproduce and deploy

Conduct EDA on Gapminder data set
Once an EDA is complete, a natural model to use first is linear regression. (project each for regression, classification and clustering)

title: Portfolio
text: This section features a selection of Shiny apps I’ve built, each designed to make data exploration and analysis more interactive. These apps cover a range of domains—from healthcare dashboards to predictive tools—and highlight my skills in R, UI design, and user-centered development. Click into each project to explore the functionality and see code samples.
